rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0001
rows.name: This is incredible...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0002
rows.name:
That's our world down there below us,
isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0003
rows.name: It appears so.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0004
rows.name:
I never imagined humans could reach
such heights...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0005
rows.name:
And what's more,
this World Tree has been here
since ancient times.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm not sure I can keep up with
what we're finding out here.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0007
rows.name: Hey, Prince! Look!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0008
rows.name: Check that out over there!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0009
rows.name:
What is it?
Did something happen?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0010
rows.name:
Look over there!
It's Genbu! I'm absolutely
positive it's Genbu!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0011
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0012
rows.name: Oh, you're right, that is Genbu!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0013
rows.name:
What are you talking about?
There's no way you can see it
from this high up.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0014
rows.name:
I'm telling you,
I can see it!
Come over here and look!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0015
rows.name: How shall I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0016
rows.name: I bet it's just some cloud or something.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0017
rows.name: I'm not particularly interested.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0101
rows.name: I don't see any sign of Luxuria anywhere.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0102
rows.name: Not over there, over here!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0103
rows.name: Look, there it is!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0104
rows.name:
It's so tiny,
I can hardly tell what it is.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0105
rows.name:
Are you sure you're not just
seeing things?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0106
rows.name:
It's not a mistake!
It's definitely Genbu!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0107
rows.name: Hmm, is that so?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0108
rows.name: Kagutsuchi...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0109
rows.name: What is it, Meleph-sama?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0110
rows.name:
Well, from my perspective,
that formation down there looks
like Superbia. Don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0111
rows.name: ...Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0112
rows.name:
Oh, so you've spotted
something as well, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0113
rows.name: Where is it?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0114
rows.name:
There it is - beside that
oddly-shaped cloud...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0115
rows.name: Ah yes, I can see something there...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0116
rows.name:
Don't you think that distinctive shape
looks like Superbia?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0117
rows.name:
You're right...
that massive landmass
does look like Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0118
rows.name:
Those flying around it are
probably Divine Beast battleships!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0119
rows.name: Just as I thought!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0120
rows.name:
Even from this height,
you can still sense
Superbia's dignified presence.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0121
rows.name: Indeed, Meleph-sama!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0122
rows.name: Come on, you two. Take a closer look.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0123
rows.name:
I'm pretty sure that's the Liberalitan
islands. Superbia doesn't have
all that greenery, does it?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0124
rows.name: Ahh...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0125
rows.name: Urk...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0201
rows.name: Why so serious? Lighten up!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0202
rows.name:
We've made it to this incredible place,
why not enjoy the experience a bit?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0203
rows.name:
What are you saying?
We didn't come here to play,
did we?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0204
rows.name:
No, I think we need to take
a breather sometimes,
Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0205
rows.name: Meleph-sama?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0206
rows.name:
I've already spotted
the Liberalitan Archipelago.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0207
rows.name:
What?! You can see those
tiny islands from here?!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0208
rows.name:
Well, look at that!
Meleph seems really into it!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0209
rows.name: Prince, we can't lose either!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0210
rows.name: Yeah, don't worry. Look over there.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0211
rows.name: Hmm? I can't see a thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0212
rows.name:
Look closely, there's a tiny dot there,
right? That's Goldmund of the
Avaritia Trading Company!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0213
rows.name: Goldmund?! Really?!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0214
rows.name: Where? I can't see anything like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0215
rows.name:
Hmm...
Yes, that is indeed Goldmund!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0216
rows.name: You can see it, Meleph-sama?!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0217
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi,
we need to find something too,
or we'll lose!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0218
rows.name: Hold on, when did this become a contest?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0219
rows.name: If that's Goldmund, then...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0220
rows.name: Could that be the Uzushio next to it?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0221
rows.name: Well... maybe it is?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0222
rows.name: Look there, Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0223
rows.name:
The Nopon crew members on
the Uzushio are waving at us!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0224
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0225
rows.name:
Now, now, Meleph.
That's a bit of a stretch,
don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0226
rows.name:
I'm not making this up.
I can clearly see them...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0227
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0228
rows.name: Um, Meleph-sama...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0229
rows.name:
That's just Tora behind us
reflected in the window...

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0230
rows.name:
No, that's wrong.
That's definitely the
Uzushio's crew.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0232
rows.name: Well, that was entertaining.

rows.label: kizunatalk039_msg0233
rows.name:
Right?
We've discovered that Meleph
absolutely hates to lose.
